caption.p: Lowest-energy docked pose of δ-elemene (left stick figure) with Fusarium oxysporum endoglucanase (Protein Data Bank, PDB 4OVW). The co-crystallized ligand (right stick figure) is 4-(β-D-glucopyranosyloxy)-2,2-dihydroxybutyl propanoate. ( A): Solid protein structure. ( B): Ribbon structure.
